caption:
This photograph depicts a large, outdoor waste disposal area, commonly known as a dump. The scene is cluttered with a variety of discarded objects spreading over an expansive area, which extends towards a forested background under a partly cloudy sky. Visible items include numerous pieces of household waste such as broken furniture, containers, boxes, appliances, and other miscellaneous debris, illustrating a significant environmental pollution issue.

A dirt path leads through the dump. At the right side of the image, there is a rustic, handmade sign attached to a tree, featuring cartoonish depictions and text. The sign reads "THROW IT OVER HERE" and humorously illustrates a person tossing trash over their shoulder. This sign seems to be directing where to dispose of additional garbage, adding a human element to the otherwise depersonalized waste landscape.

The setting is in a rural or semi-rural area, considering the natural surroundings visible in the distance beyond the waste. The image captures the aftermath of human consumption and the environmental impact of improper waste disposal practices.
title: This dump at Sunrise Beach is scheduled to be covered over.
placename: Ozarks, Lake of the, State Park (Mo.)
location: Ozarks, Lake of the, State Park, Missouri
